sitemapIndexFileSection.title: Main sitemap file
sitemapIndexFileSection.description: Main sitemap file references all other sitemap files: language sitemaps and dedicated sitemaps.

sitemapIndexURLSection.title: Sitemap Index URL
sitemapIndexURLSection.description: Add the public URL of your main sitemap file. It is needed because you may rely on proxies that are changing the URLs of your site.

updateIntervalSection.title: Update interval
updateIntervalSection.description: Sitemap files are cached by Jahia. Define the frequency at which the cache will be flushed so that Google can access the latest information about your pages.

flushCache.title: Flush sitemap cache
flushCache.description: If you recently published a lot of changes on your site, you may want to manually flush the sitemap cache.

submitToGoogle.title: Submit to Google
submitToGoogle.description: Submit your sitemap-index to Google. You should only use it when adding a new language to your site or when a new dedicated sitemap has been added.
